name: ai-abc-analysis-app
description: An application to assist educators in conducting ABC analysis of student behavior, with AI-powered feedback to improve intervention strategies.

scripts.build: esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --format=esm --jsx=automatic --define:process.env.API_KEY='"$API_KEY"' --external:react --external:react-dom --external:@google/genai --external:marked --external:jspdf --external:html2canvas && cp index.html dist/ && sed -i 's/src=".\/index.tsx"/src=".\/index.js"/' dist/index.html
